title: Expense Tracker Website
description: An application with JavaScript technologies to facilitate the creation of full-stack web applications (MERN Stack). Users can simply manage their finances with this application. They can effortlessly record their expenses, incomes, and other financial transactions, enabling them to maintain a clear overview of their financial standing and make informed decisions. Backend : - User Authentication (OAuth 2.0 Access/ Refresh Tokens )

title: Fashion Online Shop
description: This application with React and Fake REST-API is developed as a project in web development bootcamp in Ironhack. It presents Models to advertise different products like dresses , shoes, belts, etc.

title: Spiderman Game
description: A thrilling 2D game using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. In this game, player must guide Spiderman through a maze of enemies and obstacles, all while aiming to rack up the highest score possible. It's all about quick reflexes and strategic maneuvering to escape unscathed!
